product_name: Currie E3 Metro Low-Step Women's Bike - 2015
long_description: The Currie E3 Metro women's bike uses a powerful, 500-watt electric motor to propel the bike and reduce the stresses of riding. It also offers a step-through frame, a rear rack and front basket.
short_description: The Currie E3 Metro women's bike uses a powerful, 500-watt electric motor to propel the bike and reduce the stresses of riding. It also offers a step-through frame, a rear rack and front basket.
